code: import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{AppRoute}from'../../const';import{useAppDispatch}from'../../hooks';import{getDataUser}from'../../services/token';import{store}from'../../store';import{defaultFilmsCount}from'../../store/action';import{fetchFavoriteFilmsAction,logoutAction}from'../../store/api-action';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function SignOutButton(){var dispatch=useAppDispatch();var dataUser=getDataUser();return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{className:"user-block",onClick:function onClick(){return dispatch(defaultFilmsCount());},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"user-block__item",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{onClick:function onClick(){return store.dispatch(fetchFavoriteFilmsAction());},className:"user-block__avatar",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:AppRoute.MyList,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:dataUser.avatarUrl,alt:dataUser.name,width:"63",height:"63"})})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"user-block__item",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{onClick:function onClick(evt){evt.preventDefault();dispatch(logoutAction());},to:"/",className:"user-block__link",children:"Sign out"})})]});}export default SignOutButton;
